purpleculture_pinyin:
guī
to return; to go back to; to give back to; (of a responsibility) to be taken care of by; to belong to; to gather together; (used between two identical verbs) despite; to marry (of a woman) (old); division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
возвращаться; вернуться к; отдать; (ответственности), о которой следует позаботиться; принадлежать к; собираться вместе; (используется между двумя одинаковыми глаголами) несмотря на; жениться (на женщине) (стар.); деление на счетах с однозначным делителем
rtega_mnemonic:
歸歸RS
归归		帰return, return to, revert to
  • man with sword 刂 turning back to his housewife 帚
  • man sent 追 back to his housewife 帚
  • ⓢ sword 刂 and hand 手 remain
復 戻 返 還 歸
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 归)
Antonyms: 去
Pictophonetic: 㠯 indicates the sound; 止 (foot) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
歸納 [ guī nà ]: to sum up; to summarize; to conclude from facts; induction (method of deduction in logic)
歸宿 [ guī sù ]: place to return to; home; final destination; ending
歸還 [ guī huán ]: to return sth; to revert
歸根 [ guī gēn ]: to return home (after a lifetime's absence); to go back to one's roots
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • ⿱ Above to below
        • 丿 [ piě ] slash
        • 㠯 [ yǐ ] according to, for, with; to use
      • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • 帚 [ zhǒu ] broom, broomstick
heisig_chinese_memo: The maestro has his maid catch fresh deer in the woods for dinner.  He reminds her to follow her footprints to come back and, of course, put on the apron and pick up the broom as soon as she returns.
Ru_trainchinese:
guī: (графема) приходить обратно, возвращаться; отдавать обратно, возвращать
guī: (глаг) используется между двумя глаголами, указывает, что действие не приводит к соответствующему результату
guī: (глаг/предлог) принадлежать; сходиться в одном месте, сливаться; управляться или контролироваться (кем-то / чем-то)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When the female soldier is able to come back from war she is happy to resume a relaxing life with a broom instead of a saber.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " 𠂤 " from " broom "," 𠂤 "is also a sound symbol. " 𠂤 " is the ancient word for " division ", which means the army. The " broom " is like a broom. It is suspected that the army will wipe out the enemy and return in the war (Ji Xusheng, Ye Yusen). The original meaning is triumphant return, return, return, return . Say " go " is a double phonetic word, " broom ", " coma " the same old words, " broom " may initially be read as " coma " " coma ", " return " the sounds, it " 𠂤 ", " broom " All are the sound symbols of " Gui " (Shen Pei).

The inscriptions on the inscriptions were either added from " zhi " or "辵". The bamboo slips of the Warring States period were mostly from "辵" as a sign, emphasizing the movement of walking.

Oracle said to return, "Yin Xu Characters Second Edition" 7961: "Zhen: Wang Qigui". It is also used as the name of Fang's country, "Compilation" 33070: "Guibai (Bo)", Guo Moruo believed that " gui " means Kui, in present-day Zigui County, Hubei. "Shui Jing Zhu": "Go east to Zigui to the south of the county" and the cloud: "County, hometown. "Geography" says: Return to Ziguo. "Lewei" says: The rules of Ye Shenglu, Song Dynasty Zhong said: "Going back is Kui, returning to the hometown, covering the hometown of Kui."

Jin Wen also said to return, and Ying Hou looked at Gongzhong: "The king returns from Cheng Zhou", which means that Wang returned from Cheng Zhou. Not to be guilty: "I come back, offer the birds (capture)." It means that I come back and offer the capture. And pass false to " feed " this means gift giving, raccoon wine container: "King's Road make return (feed) raccoon deer-III", which means King's Road given command raccoon three deer. "The Analects. "Yanghuo": "Return to Confucius Dolphin", "Classic Interpretation": "Return, Zheng Ben made a contribution." "Zuo Zhuan. "The Second Year of Min Gong": "Go to the public and ride the horse", Du pre-notes: "Go, Yi Ye." Also used as the name of a country and a person.

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period (Chen Wei), "Guodian Chu Slips. "Respect for Virtue and Righteousness" Jane 20: "Respect for benevolence, loyalty, respect and strong (long), return to Feng (li)", "guili" refers to ritual.

Later, " gui " was used to indicate that a woman married, "Poetry. Zhou Nan. "Taoyao": "The son is home to his family."

"Said Wen": "Go back, women marry. From the end, from the women's province, 𠂤sheng. 㱕, the language province."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " 𠂤 " from " broom ", " 𠂤 " is also a sound symbol. " 𠂤 " is the ancient word for " division ", which means the army. The " broom " is like a broom. It is suspected that the army will wipe out the enemy and return in the war (Ji Xusheng, Ye Yusen). The original meaning is triumphant return, return, return, return .
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「𠂤」從「帚」，「𠂤」亦是聲符。「𠂤」是古「師」字，表示軍隊，「帚」象掃帚，疑會在戰爭中以軍隊掃除敵人而歸之意(季旭昇、葉玉森)，本義是凱旋而歸、返歸、返回、歸還。一說「歸」是雙聲符字，「帚」、「彗」古同字，「帚」最初可能讀作「彗」，「彗」、「歸」音近，故「𠂤」、「帚」皆是「歸」的聲符(沈培)。

　　金文或加從「止」，或加從「辵」，戰國竹簡多從「辵」為意符，強調行走之動作。

　　甲骨文表示返回，《殷虛文字乙編》7961：「貞：王其歸」。又用作方國名，《合集》33070：「歸白(伯)」，郭沫若認為「歸」即夔國，在今湖北秭歸縣。《水經注》：「又東過秭歸縣之南」下云：「縣，故歸鄉。《地理志》曰：歸子國也。《樂緯》曰：昔歸典叶聲律，宋忠曰：歸即夔，歸鄉，蓋夔鄉矣。」

　　金文也表示返回，應侯視工鐘：「王歸自成周」，意謂王從成周回來。不其簋：「余來歸，獻禽(擒)。」意謂我回來，進獻所擒。又通假為「饋」，表示贈送、給予，貉子卣：「王令士道歸(饋)貉子鹿三」，意謂王命令士道給予貉子三隻鹿。《論語．陽貨》：「歸孔子豚」，《經典釋文》：「歸，鄭本作饋。」《左傳．閔公二年》：「歸公乘馬」，杜預注：「歸，遺也。」又用作國名、人名。

　　戰國竹簡表示歸依(陳偉)，《郭店楚簡．尊德義》簡20：「尊仁，親忠，敬壯(長)，歸豊(禮)」，「歸禮」即以禮為依歸。

　　後來「歸」用來表示女子出嫁，《詩．周南．桃夭》：「之子于歸，宜其室家。」

　　《說文》：「歸，女嫁也。从止，从婦省，𠂤聲。㱕，籒文省。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「𠂤」從「帚」，「𠂤」亦是聲符。「𠂤」是古「師」字，表示軍隊，「帚」象掃帚，疑會在戰爭中以軍隊掃除敵人而歸之意(季旭昇、葉玉森)，本義是凱旋而歸、返歸、返回、歸還。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
歸 (Simplified: 归)
Pinyin: guī
English Definition: to return; to go back to; to give back to; (of a responsibility) to be taken care of by; to belong to; to gather together; (used between two identical verbs) despite; to marry (of a woman) (old); division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
Antonyms: 去
Total strokes: 18; Radical: 止
Pictophonetic: 㠯 indicates the sound; 止 (foot) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • ⿱ Above to below
        • 丿 [ piě ] slash
        • 㠯 [ yǐ ] according to, for, with; to use
      • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • 帚 [ zhǒu ] broom, broomstick
Example Words:
歸納 [ guī nà ]: to sum up; to summarize; to conclude from facts; induction (method of deduction in logic)
歸宿 [ guī sù ]: place to return to; home; final destination; ending
歸還 [ guī huán ]: to return sth; to revert
歸根 [ guī gēn ]: to return home (after a lifetime's absence); to go back to one's roots
More: 歸* | *歸 | *歸*

Chinese: The maestro has his maid catch fresh deer in the woods for dinner. He reminds her to follow her footprints to come back and, of course, put on the apron and pick up the broom as soon as she returns.
Meaning: come back
Hanzi: 归
Story: When the female soldier is able to come back from war she is happy to resume a relaxing life with a broom instead of a saber.
Kind: traditional

甲骨文從「 𠂤 」從「 帚 」，「 𠂤 」亦是聲符。「 𠂤 」是古「 師 」字，表示軍隊，「 帚 」象掃帚，疑會在戰爭中以軍隊掃除敵人而歸之意(季旭昇、葉玉森)，本義是凱旋而歸、返歸、返回、歸還。一說「 歸 」是雙聲符字，「 帚 」、「 彗 」古同字，「 帚 」最初可能讀作「 彗 」，「 彗 」、「 歸 」音近，故「 𠂤 」、「 帚 」皆是「 歸 」的聲符(沈培)。 金文或加從「 止 」，或加從「 辵 」，戰國竹簡多從「 辵 」為意符，強調行走之動作。 甲骨文表示返回，《殷虛文字乙編》7961：「貞：王其歸」。又用作方國名，《合集》33070：「歸白(伯)」，郭沫若認為「 歸 」即夔國，在今湖北秭歸縣。《水經注》：「又東過秭歸縣之南」下云：「縣，故歸鄉。《地理志》曰：歸子國也。《樂緯》曰：昔歸典叶聲律，宋忠曰：歸即夔，歸鄉，蓋夔鄉矣。」 金文也表示返回，應侯視工鐘：「王歸自成周」，意謂王從成周回來。不其簋：「余來歸，獻禽(擒)。」意謂我回來，進獻所擒。又通假為「 饋 」，表示贈送、給予，貉子卣：「王令士道歸(饋)貉子鹿三」，意謂王命令士道給予貉子三隻鹿。《論語．陽貨》：「歸孔子豚」，《經典釋文》：「歸，鄭本作饋。」《左傳．閔公二年》：「歸公乘馬」，杜預注：「歸，遺也。」又用作國名、人名。 戰國竹簡表示歸依(陳偉)，《郭店楚簡．尊德義》簡20：「尊仁，親忠，敬壯(長)，歸豊(禮)」，「歸禮」即以禮為依歸。 後來「 歸 」用來表示女子出嫁，《詩．周南．桃夭》：「之子于歸，宜其室家。」 《說文》：「歸，女嫁也。从止，从婦省，𠂤聲。㱕，籒文省。」

歸字的基本解释

歸
guī
见“归”。

歸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》舉韋切，平微，見。］
亦作“帰1”。“归1”的繁体字。
(1)古代谓女子出嫁。
(2)返回。
(3)特指出嫁女儿返回娘家。
(4)归还。
(5)趋向；归附。
(6)会集；合并。
(7)引申为收拾整理。
(8)归属。
(9)结局；归宿。
(10)终，最后。
(11)归纳。
(12)本，宗旨。
(13)称许。
(14)自首。
(15)珠算中除数是一位数的除法。
(16)泛指计算，结算。
(17)用在相同的动词之间，表示动作并未引起相应的结果。
(18)姓。唐有归崇敬。见《新唐书》本传。
[②]［kuì］
［《集韻》求位切，去至，羣。］
“归2”的繁体字。
(1)通“饋”。赠送。
(2)通“愧”。惭愧。

歸字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歸； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页578第07
〔古文〕?【唐韻】舉韋切【集韻】居韋切，?音騩。還也，入也。【詩·小雅】薄音旋歸。　又還所取之物亦曰歸。【春秋·定十年】齊人來歸鄆、讙、龜隂田。又【禮·祭義】父母全而生之，予全而歸之。【孟子】久假而不歸。皆還復之義。　又【春秋·隱元年】歸惠公仲子之賵。【杜註】歸者，不反之辭。【桓七年】突歸于鄭。【穀梁傳】歸，易辭也。　又依歸也。【詩·曹風】于我歸處。【毛傳】歸，依歸也。　又歸附也。【穀梁傳·莊二年】王者，民之所歸往也。【詩·大雅】豈弟君子，民之攸歸。　又【說文】女嫁也。【詩·周南】之子于歸。【禮·禮運】男有分，女有歸。又【穀梁傳·隱二年】婦人謂嫁曰歸，反曰來歸。【註】嫁而曰歸，明外屬也。反曰來歸，明從外至也。【左傳·莊二十七年】凡諸侯之女歸寧曰來，出曰來歸。夫人歸寧曰如某，出曰歸于某。　又投也，委也。【左傳·襄三年】請歸死于司敗。又【前漢·申屠嘉傳】鼂錯恐自歸景帝。【註】師古曰：自首于天子。　又與也，許也。【論語】天下歸仁焉。　又合也。【禮·緇衣

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

歸字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guang Yun" cite Wei Qi, Ping Wei, see. ]
Also known as "帰1". Traditional characters for "归1".
(1) In ancient times, it was said that a woman married.
(2) Return.
(3) Specially pointed out that marrying a daughter and returning to her natal family.
(4) Return.
(5) Tendency; Attachment.
(6) Gathering; merger.
(7) The extension is tidying up.
(8) Attribution.
(9) Ending; destiny.
(10) Finally, finally.
(11) Induction.
(12) This, purpose.
(13) Praise.
(14) Volunteer.
(15) The divisor in abacus is the division of one digit.
(16) Generally refers to calculation and settlement.
(17) Used between the same verb to indicate that the action did not cause the corresponding result.
(18) Last name. Tang Yougui revered. See the biography of "New Tang Book".
[②]［kuì］
["Ji Yun" Seek position, go to, group. ]
Traditional characters for "归2".
(1) Through "feed". Give away.
(2) Through "ashamed". Ashamed.

[Chen Jixia] [Zhizi Department] 　 Gui; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 578 No. 07
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Ju Weiqie [Jiyun] Juweiqie,? Sound. Also, enter. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Boyin returns.　I also said to return what I took. [Spring and Autumn · Ten Years] The people of Qi come back to Yun, Yu and Guiyintian. Also 【Ritual·Sacrificial Righteousness】Parents are born from the whole, and they return to the whole. [Mencius] Leave without returning for a long time. All are also the meaning of rejuvenation.　[Chunqiu·Yinyuan] Returned to Hui Gong Zhongzi. [Du Note] Those who return, do not say the opposite. [Huan Seven Years] Suddenly return to Zheng. [Gu Liang Chuan] Return, change words.　Return to home again. [Poetry·Cao Feng] Return to me. [Mao Chuan] Go back, go back.　Return to Fu also. [Guliang Chuan·The Second Year of Zhuang] The king is the home of the people. 【Poetry·Daya】Qi, a gentleman, the people are worthy of return.　[Said Wen] Women married. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】The son of homecoming. 【Rite·Rite Luck】Men have points, and women have points. Also [Guliang Chuan·Hidden Years] The woman said that she would return when she married, but she said she would return. [Note] Marriage and return, and Ming foreigners are also. On the contrary, he said that he came back, and that he came from the outside. [Twenty-seventh year of Zuo Zhuan] All the daughters of the princes returned to Ning and said to come back. The wife returned to Ning and said to be like a certain, and she said to belong to a certain.　I voted again, and I did. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Three Years] Please die to the defeat. Also【Previous Han·Shentu Jia Biography】Miao mistakenly returned to Emperor Jing. [Note] Shi Gu said: surrender to the emperor.　You and Ye, Xu Ye. [The Analects] The world belongs to all.　Hey again. 【Li·Yi Yi
